message.name: ERR_ISSUECASE_NOT_APPROVED_CANNOT_APPEAL_ISSUE
message.locale: Issue Case has not been approved. Cannot appeal the Issue Case

message.name: ERR_ISSUECASE_NO_APPEAL_PROCESS_CANNOT_APPEAL_ISSUE
message.locale: An appeal cannot be created as an appeal process has not been defined. Please contact your system administrator

message.name: ERR_ISSUECASE_NO_ACTIVEAPPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: There is no appeal process defined for this issue case.
